thread.title: Detective’s offensive posts prompt Metro to adopt new social media policy

title: Detective’s offensive posts prompt Metro to adopt new social media policy
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
In response to concerns over a Metro Police detective who posted a racially fueled rant on Facebook last year, the department has adopted a ...
